Detailed Description

Encapsulates a force field computation

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gigide::ForceField::ForceField ( boost::intrusive_ptr< Molecule >  center_mol,
std::vector< boost::intrusive_ptr< InternalCoordinate > >  coords,
std::vector< boost::intrusive_ptr< SimpleInternalCoordinate > >  simples 
)

Constructor. The constructor builds a displacement and derivative iterator.

Parameters:
center_mol The molecule at the center of the displacements
coords The set of internal coordinates to displace
simples The set of simple internals comprising the coordinates

boost::intrusive_ptr<DerivativeIterator> gigide::ForceField::compute_iter_ [private]

An iterator for generating and iterating derivatives of values

std::vector< boost::intrusive_ptr<InternalCoordinate> > gigide::ForceField::coords_ [private]

The set of all internal coordinates

boost::intrusive_ptr<DerivativeIterator> gigide::ForceField::deriv_iter_ [private]

The derivative iterator for all derivatives

VectorPtr gigide::ForceField::derivatives_ [private]

The derivatives that have been computed from the energy points

boost::intrusive_ptr<DisplacementIterator> gigide::ForceField::disp_iter_ [private]

An iterator for generating and iterating displacements

std::vector<double> gigide::ForceField::disp_sizes_ [private]

The displacement sizes for each internal coordinate. The units are set by the input file

SymmMatrixPtr gigide::ForceField::fc_ [private]

The force constant matrix... only applicable to when 2nd derivatives or higher are computed

boost::intrusive_ptr<DerivativeIterator> gigide::ForceField::fit_iter_ [private]

A derivative that inclues the necessary derivaties for generating a certain level of robustness

SymmMatrixPtr gigide::ForceField::G_ [private]

The G matrix, describing the combination of two B matrix elements

VectorPtr gigide::ForceField::grads_ [private]

The gradients

bool gigide::ForceField::include_zeros_ [private]

Depending on the type of derivatives being computed, we may or may not be able to throw out displacments

boost::intrusive_ptr<Molecule> gigide::ForceField::mol_ [private]

The molecule for which a force field is being computed. This is the undisplaced molecule

std::vector< boost::intrusive_ptr<SimpleInternalCoordinate> > gigide::ForceField::simples_ [private]

The set of all simple internals comprising the internal coordinates

boost::intrusive_ptr<DerivativeIterator> gigide::ForceField::value_iter_ [private]

A derivative iterator for the provided values. This may do nothing if energies are provided, or it may do a lot if 2nd derivatives are provided.
